name: Problem: Bug
description: Inconsistencies or issues which will cause an issue or problem for users or implementors.

name: Problem: Security
description: This should be dealt with ASAP. It is security breach or not fixing this issue would be a serious error.

name: Problem: Production
description: High priority, especially if it's present in production.

name: Platform: CLI
description: Affect user experience in a terminal.

name: Platform: API
description: Related to the API usage and experience.

name: Platform: Front-end
description: Problem in the front-end source code - user's experience, visual bugs and etc.

name: Platform: Back-end
description: Problem in servers, databases, server configurations and etc.

name: Feedback: Question
description: A query or seeking clarification. Probably doesn't need the attention of everyone, just a few to help bring clarification or explain intent.

name: Feedback: Discussion
description: Requires further conversation to figure out the action steps.  Doesn't need the attention of everyone.

name: Feedback: RFC
description: Most feature ideas start here. As many people as possible joining the discussion is encouraged.

name: invalid
description: The issue is either fixed, addressed better by other issues, or just out of product scope.

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request topic/problem already exists.

name: wontfix
description: No action needed or possible.

name: Pending: In Progress
description: This issue is being worked on and has someone assigned.

name: Pending: Blocked
description: Taking action, but need a few things to happen first. There is another issue that needs to be resolved first, or a specific person is required to comment/reply to progress. There may also be some external blocker.

name: Pending: Help Wanted
description: Extra attention is needed by someone other than the team. Good first problem to solve by new contributors.

name: dependencies
description: Dependency updates by Dependabot or RenvoateApp

name: Improvements: Enhancement
description: Iterations on existing features, quality or infrastructure.

name: Improvements: Optimization
description: Generally these are updates for speed or improve the quality of results.

name: Improvements: Documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation

name: ready
description: Ready for merge.
